ticket.title: Malformed XML request returns vague error
ticket.original-body:
When sending a malformed xml request on rails 2.3 rc1, you receive a vague error leading the user to believe the problem is an application one instead of an input one.
http://github.com/rails/rails/blob/8607740a29d0f9ceb2ca21c9ef714f74b64d4a88/actionpack/lib/action_controller/params_parser.rb#L33-34
throws an exception which is re-raised below:
http://github.com/rails/rails/blob/8607740a29d0f9ceb2ca21c9ef714f74b64d4a88/actionpack/lib/action_controller/params_parser.rb#L49-55
which is then rescued and returns a response from:
http://github.com/rails/rails/blob/8607740a29d0f9ceb2ca21c9ef714f74b64d4a88/actionpack/lib/action_controller/failsafe.rb
The response is a generic 500 error html response (and it should be at least returning an xml response).
I'm not sure where to begin with fixing this, any ideas?
